github_network_fault.name: Network Fault Prediction Dataset
github_network_fault.description: Fault severity in telecom network disruptions with classification features. Predicts long-tail network events driving logistics demands for repair/parts.
github_network_fault.preprocessing_notes: Predicts long-tail network faults for demand forecasting. Fault severity classification helps prioritize response logistics. Telstra network data.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

kaggle_smart_logistics.name: Smart Logistics Supply Chain Dataset
kaggle_smart_logistics.description: Real-time 2024 data on delivery performance, routing efficiency, warehouse operations, and resource allocation. Features: Timestamps, shipment details, KPIs like transit times.
kaggle_smart_logistics.preprocessing_notes: High for telecom logistics, enabling demand forecasting for equipment transport amid volatile networks; long-tail via rare route disruptions.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

ieee_wind_turbine_failures.name: Correlation Between Wind Turbine Failures and Environmental Factors
ieee_wind_turbine_failures.description: IEEE paper on wind turbine failures correlated with environmental factors. Average repair costs and times. Useful for long-tail prediction in telecom towers.
ieee_wind_turbine_failures.preprocessing_notes: IEEE paper with failure correlation data. May require PDF parsing to extract structured data.
ieee_wind_turbine_failures.notes: Proxy for telecom tower structural maintenance

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

kaggle_cloud_supply_chain.name: Cloud-Based Supply Chain Demand Dataset
kaggle_cloud_supply_chain.description: Real-time data from cloud-based environment for demand forecasting and inventory management. Features: 3,204 records of historical sales, inventory levels, supplier details, lead times, and costs.
kaggle_cloud_supply_chain.preprocessing_notes: Directly supports telecom logistics by modeling demand for hardware shipments; adaptable for long-tail items via variability analysis.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

test_dataset.name: Test Sample Dataset
test_dataset.description: Sample dataset for testing pipeline (730 days, 2 years)
test_dataset.preprocessing_notes: Test dataset with 2 years of daily data

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

springer_digital_divide.name: Bridging the Digital Divide: Internet Connectivity Evolution
springer_digital_divide.description: Nearly 100 million entries from Ookla on speed tests and connectivity in Brazilian cities, focusing on urban-rural gaps.
springer_digital_divide.preprocessing_notes: Massive dataset (~100M records) requiring Dask for processing. Sample 1-5M records initially for feasibility. Potential sampling biases. Spatial demand forecasting for broadband logistics.
springer_digital_divide.notes: May need sampling due to 100M+ records. Geographic data perfect for Nova Corrente's 18,000 towers.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

zenodo_bgsmt_mobility.name: Brazilian GSM Telecom (BGSMT) Mobility Dataset
zenodo_bgsmt_mobility.description: 526,894 mobility records from 4,545 users, September 2017 - September 2018, 15-minute intervals. Mobility patterns across multiple Brazilian states.
zenodo_bgsmt_mobility.preprocessing_notes: High-value mobility dataset for demand forecasting based on user movement, tower load prediction, and infrastructure planning.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

brazilian_fiber_structured.name: Brazilian Fiber Optic Expansion Structured Data
brazilian_fiber_structured.description: Quarterly fiber household penetration data from 2020-2024 by region (Southeast, South, Northeast, North, Central West).
brazilian_fiber_structured.preprocessing_notes: Generated structured data from market reports. Household penetration 25% (2020) to 49% (2024). Regional breakdown essential for infrastructure planning.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

brazilian_operators_structured.name: Brazilian Telecom Operators Market Data
brazilian_operators_structured.description: Monthly operator market data from 2019-2024: Vivo, Claro, TIM, Others. Subscribers, market share, 5G coverage.
brazilian_operators_structured.preprocessing_notes: Generated structured data from public reports. Market share dynamics: Vivo (32%), Claro (27%), TIM (20%). Essential for competitive analysis.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

anatel_spectrum.name: Anatel Spectrum Usage Data
anatel_spectrum.description: Spectrum allocation and usage data from Anatel. Frequency bands, operators, geographic coverage.
anatel_spectrum.preprocessing_notes: Anatel spectrum data. Useful for understanding infrastructure deployment patterns and demand drivers.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

gsma_mobile_connectivity_brazil.name: GSMA Mobile Connectivity Index - Brazil
gsma_mobile_connectivity_brazil.description: Mobile connectivity metrics for Brazil from GSMA. Includes 5G coverage, IoT connections, mobile economy indicators.
gsma_mobile_connectivity_brazil.preprocessing_notes: GSMA official mobile connectivity data for Brazil. Essential for understanding 5G and IoT growth trends.
gsma_mobile_connectivity_brazil.notes: Mobile connectivity indicators for infrastructure planning

gsma_mobile_economy_brazil.name: GSMA Mobile Economy Brazil 2024
gsma_mobile_economy_brazil.description: Comprehensive mobile economy report for Brazil. Includes subscriber trends, 5G deployment, economic impact.
gsma_mobile_economy_brazil.preprocessing_notes: GSMA Mobile Economy report. May require PDF parsing. Contains annual forecasts and market analysis.
gsma_mobile_economy_brazil.notes: Long-term market trends and forecasts for telecom logistics planning

zenodo_ai_decarbonization.name: AI-driven Decarbonization of Buildings: Predictive Maintenance
zenodo_ai_decarbonization.description: Predictive maintenance dataset for energy systems. Adaptable to telecom towers with MAPE metrics.
zenodo_ai_decarbonization.preprocessing_notes: Predictive maintenance for energy systems, adaptable to telecom towers.
zenodo_ai_decarbonization.notes: MAPE metrics included for model validation

internet_aberta_roi_brazil.name: Evaluating The Return On Investment Of National Telecommunications Service Providers In Brazil
internet_aberta_roi_brazil.description: ROI analysis of Brazilian telecom service providers. Provides benchmarks for ROI >100% in B2B contexts.
internet_aberta_roi_brazil.preprocessing_notes: ROI analysis paper. May require PDF parsing. Contains benchmarks for telecom operator ROI.
internet_aberta_roi_brazil.notes: ROI benchmarks for Nova Corrente operations

kaggle_supply_chain.name: High-Dimensional Supply Chain Inventory
kaggle_supply_chain.description: Hundreds of thousands of supply chain records

kaggle_telecom_network.name: Telecom Network Dataset
kaggle_telecom_network.description: Tower-level operations data with tower ID, connected users, download speeds, and performance indicators. Supports logistics for capacity planning and demand forecasting.
kaggle_telecom_network.preprocessing_notes: Capacity utilization data for logistics planning. Long-tail aspects emerge in low-traffic tower maintenance patterns.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

anatel_mobile_brazil.name: Mobile Phone Accesses in Brazil
anatel_mobile_brazil.description: Comprehensive open data on mobile and broadband accesses, available in CSV format. Includes subscriber trends and technology breakdowns (GSM, 5G). Anatel official data.
anatel_mobile_brazil.preprocessing_notes: Anatel official data on mobile subscribers. Track subscriber growth and technology adoption (5G, 4G, etc.). Regional granularity. May lag in updates - cross-verify with commercial sources.
anatel_mobile_brazil.notes: Brazilian telecom regulatory data. Essential for demand forecasting in 5G logistics.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

internet_aberta_forecast.name: Data Traffic Demand Forecast for Brazil
internet_aberta_forecast.description: Top-down projections on broadband users, 4G/5G prevalence, GDP correlations, and data consumption (297 to 400 exabytes by 2033).
internet_aberta_forecast.preprocessing_notes: Long-term logistics planning in telecom. Addresses intermittent high-demand periods (major events). Forecast uncertainties inherent. May require PDF parsing.
internet_aberta_forecast.notes: Essential for long-term logistics planning. Forecast uncertainties require hedging strategies.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

brazilian_demand_factors.name: Brazilian Demand Factors (Economic, Climatic, Regulatory)
brazilian_demand_factors.description: Daily demand factors from 2019-2024: GDP growth, inflation, exchange rates, temperature, precipitation, flood risks, 5G milestones, holidays.
brazilian_demand_factors.preprocessing_notes: Generated structured data simulating economic, climatic, and regulatory factors. Essential external factors for demand forecasting models.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

anatel_broadband.name: Anatel Broadband Accesses
anatel_broadband.description: Municipality-level broadband connection data from Anatel. Coverage, speeds, and technology breakdown.
anatel_broadband.preprocessing_notes: Anatel official broadband data. Municipality-level granularity for spatial demand forecasting.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

github_5g3e.name: 5G3E Virtualized Infrastructure Dataset
github_5g3e.description: 14 days of time-series from virtualized 5G infrastructure with radio, server, OS, and network function data. Thousands of features grouped by resource/node type.
github_5g3e.preprocessing_notes: Excellent for predictive maintenance in telecom logistics. Forecasts demand for replacement parts amid long-tail failures (rare node outages). Integrates well with SARIMAX/Prophet/LSTM ensembles for uncertainty hedging. Size may require sampling or batch processing.
github_5g3e.notes: Large multivariate time-series - may need to process in batches

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

kaggle_equipment_failure.name: Equipment Failure Prediction Dataset
kaggle_equipment_failure.description: 10,000 points with 14 features on machine failures (hardware/software types). Models long-tail failures in telecom equipment, informing demand for spare parts.
kaggle_equipment_failure.preprocessing_notes: Models long-tail equipment failures driving logistics demands for spare parts. Classification features for failure types. Useful for rare event prediction.

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline

bacen_exchange_rate_usd.name: BACEN Exchange Rate (USD/BRL)
bacen_exchange_rate_usd.description: Daily USD/BRL exchange rate from Brazilian Central Bank
bacen_exchange_rate_usd.preprocessing_notes: Critical economic factor. Exchange rate affects import costs and demand for imported telecom equipment. Volatility indicates currency crisis risk.
bacen_exchange_rate_usd.notes: Exchange rate trends influence inventory decisions (anticipate purchases during devaluation)

_evaluation.recommendation: HIGH - Strong relevance, recommended for pipeline
